Great game. Although short, and the puzzles were fairly simple, end is great if you know what to do or if you need some help from a guide. Some people say that it has a "terrible ending" but they didn't get to the actual end.
Absolutely recommeded to play even if you are not into puzzles - its got story, its got fun, its got sarcams and its got *GASP*.. plot twist!

I picked up the Portal Bundle for $4.84 during the winter sale and boy, did I get my money's worth. 

It was short but sweet. Love the story and the GLaDoS' banter. 

The sequel has much more content and is quite a bit longer, with more variety in puzzles. 

Lots of replay value in both games! Played them both in under 24 hours, back to back. Amazing ride!

O que dizer dessa maravilha chamada Portal ? Esse jogo é MUITO divertido e viciante, e não é somente um jogo de puzzles e sim um jogo épico com uma história macabra sendo contada através das fases. Em geral esse é um ótimo jogo que eu recomendo muito.

A very fun and entertaining game. The puzzles were challenging and after I would accomplish them, I honestly felt proud of myself. The presentation also was great from GLADOS' remarks to things shown in the game, it helped give me an idea on what situation I was put in. I overall enjoy this game, and I recommend not skipping out on this one.

Игра революция в игростроении от самой Valve. Это действительно игра, где ты получишь настоящий игровой опыт, только если сыграешь в нее. Так что в нее стоит поиграть. 
При первом прохождении она (лично для Меня) показалась долгой и скорее нудной. Но при повторном прохождении (во второй раз играл ради комментариев разработчиков), особенно после второй части игры "Portal 2" - она оказывается короткой (как капля воды в море) и даже зная механику игры ты можешь обойти "хитрым" способом систему, которой до этого следовал - и это прикольно. 
P.S. да и брать игру лучше сразу в комплекте с 2 частью. так как 1 часть лишь как демо-версия перед началом бури)))

Nice game

Amazing!! I heard Portal was one of the best game in steam,but I hesitated to play it because of the good reputation.
So I haven't play it until today and today I also understood  why everyone loves this.

Unfortunately my wifi timed out while I was playing, my steam account said 2 hours when I finished the game, though this review may say I have played around .2 hours (or probably more because I'm going to continue playing the advanced levels).

This isn't actually the first portal game I've played, I first played portal 2 some years ago. The game was truly a lot of fun and  I was very eager to check out portal now that I've rediscovered in the midst of steam sales. Noone can complain for the price tag of 2 dollars and even 10 isn't too much to ask considering what you are getting.

Pros:
-The puzzles are very engaging and fun to play.
-It is made with the source engine meaning its easy to create new levels.
-The storyline is unique and unlike any other series I have seen so far.
-Fans of the talos principle will enjoy this game, fans of portal will enjoy the talos principle.
-Turrets that try and kill you always say they don't blame you for deactivating them before they could do their jobs.
-Cake

Cons:
-The story line was kind of short, I finished it in two hours.
-Its a lot easier if you've already played portal 2.

Extra Notes:
If you have not played any of the portal games, start with this one even though the graphics of portal 2 look nicer. Believe it, or not, the story actually sort of fits together. Also though Portal on its own was pretty hard (just wait until you get to the turrets), portal 2 has more stuff it can throw at you such as gels that do different things and it definitely achieves the "creepy giant abandoned lab" a bit more than this game.

Portal 2 is one of my favorite games, I had some high expectations for the original portal game and I was not disappointed!

Um Otimo Jogo Para Passar O Tempo Com Quebra Cabeças!
No se que haces aquí, debes comprar este juego! Es un juego increíble, su diseño de niveles es asombroso e ingenioso, sus mecánicas y jugabilidad son únicas, es un juego que si o si debes jugar.

This game is honestly a masterclass in level and tutorial design. Once you start thinking about it, most of the game is about teaching you how to play the game, and until you start thinking about it, you don't even realise it. You're far too busy figuring out the interesting puzzles they laid out for you.

While just that would justify buying the game for me, the exceptionally clever writing, hinting at a far larger world that may or may not be in a post-apocalyptic state with perhaps hundreds years of history.

All in all a game definitely worth the purchase.

Baseado na engine do Half Life/Counter Strike, Portal é um jogo de puzzle em 1a. pessoa muito interessante.
Você é uma cobaia humana que deve solucionar alguns quebra-cabeças utilzando portais para se locomover.
O jogo não possui nível de dificuldade, e os desafios são amigáveis, o que lhe impede de ficar horas parado num mesmo nível. O jogo é curto, com cerca de 2 horas de jogo propriamente dito, e cerca de 3 a 4 horas totais.
Mas é um jogo muito bacana, com uma pegada diferente e inteligente. História com um bom humor, apesar de ligeiramente infantil.
Recomendo bastante jogar o primeiro jogo Portal, mesmo que a engine seja antiga (ano de 2007), pois o objetivo do jogo é a sua jogabilidade e não os gráficos.
Agora vou esperar alguma promoção para pegar o Portal 2, enquanto tento atingir todas as conquistas deste primeiro jogo.

Tesis: Un pedazo de juego.

Argumento: Lo jugué en su tiempo y sé que, así como yo, muchos quedamos asombrados por lo novedoso que fue, generar portales para jugar con las fisicas y resolver rompecabezas en 3D; era simplemente fascinante. Luego de muchos años, lo compré en Steam porque realmente son juegos que vale la pena tener en la biblioteca y a pesar de volver a jugarlo y sentir que me lo pasé 'rapido' que parece que no duró nada la experiencia, me sigue maravillando a día de hoy. Siempre lo recomendaré y mucho más Portal 2.

今更ながらプレイ。評判通り面白かった。
事前知識無しでやったためストーリーの展開にとても興奮したので、
買おうか悩んでる人はレビューをこれ以上見ずに初見でプレイしよう。

謎解きだけでなく、随所に散りばめられたハヤカワみのあるブラックユーモアがとてもツボ
難点をあげるとすれば３D酔いしやすいと思うので、酔いやすい人は休憩いれまくりながらじゃないと出来ない点。
ボリュームについてはのんびりやって４時間だったため少なめか。
続編の２では増えているらしいので、ストーリも好みだったことだしそのうちプレイしよう。

Só queria dizer que "Ekac si evila".. Fica a dica pessoal (Apesar de que você descobre ao longo do jogo)
Bom jogo para quem for comprar!

A must play. 

Portal is a game that many have probably played and/or heard of, and it deserves its praise.
It’s a simple puzzle game, but it doesn’t need to be anything more. 

I completed the game in just over an hour, so you might want to get it on a sale. 
But this along with Portal 2 is a must play for any gamer.

It also has a demo is you’re really worried.
Great game.
I strongly recommend this game to every living creature on this universe! Thanks Valve! Sincerely!

Vaya JUEGAZO.

Empezaré hablando sobre la presentación.

He de decir que al principio tuve un poco de miedo de comprarlo debido a que era nuevo en este tipo de juegos, pero me arriesgé y... ¡No me arrepiento! se notaba la presentación fuerte, insistiendo en la idea de los portales. eso me gustó :D

Los graficos, los de half life, que decir de ellos, son buenísimos y siendo 2016 no ofenden a la vista de nadie.

La jugabilidad.... ES UNA CACOTA (mentira) La mejor jugabilidad de juego de puzzles sin duda, innovadora y a la vez invita a los jugadores nuevos a pasar las etapas que van aumentando en dificultad. En algo que si falla un poco el juego es en la duración con una duración estimada de 3,5 H, pero lo recompensa ya que en esa ridícula cantidad de tiempo nos engancha con su historia, que si bien no es la mejor, con solo tener a Glados ya es un puntazo, ya que glados es uno de los personajes mas bien planificados que he visto en mucho tiempo, a pesar de ser una IA tiene sentimientos, pero esos sentimientos son neutros por así decirlo, es dificil de explicar, además de poseer un sentido del humor irónico y mostrar capacidad de improvisar. El lore de este mismo probablemente me haga proximamente comprar la parte 2 xD,

En banda sonora, pues lo poco que he escuchado me ha agradado, lo de la radio en especial.

Simplemente un J-U-E-G-A-Z-O con todas las letras. 9,7/10.
Por desgracia bastante corto, pero muy recomendable y muy entretenido

포탈 2를 먼저 해보고 1을 구매했습니다.
사실상 2의 스케일이나 볼륨에 비하면 정말 보잘것없다고 생각합니다.
그러나 전설의 명작 포탈 2의 프리퀄로서 받아들인다면 대만족.

각종 버그가 난무한다는 소문을 들었으나, 플레이 할 때는 크게 느끼지 못했습니다.
스토리를 전부 클리어하고 Advanced Chamber를 플레이할 수 있는데, 이건 꽤 어렵더군요.

퍼즐 게임의 명작이니만큼 구매에 후회 없으시리라 생각됩니다. 추천.

Beautiful situational puzzle game.  Portal makes you think outside of the box, using physics, and just all the little clues they give you.  You deal with a few enemies not by simply shooting a projectile like every other FPS, BUT by using your portals in interesting ways to distinguish their flame of life.  The originality is worth the purchase.  Awesome "ending", and can last between 2-9 hours depending on what you want to get out of this gem! 10/10
Beat the game pretty fast, made me alittle dizzy when playing so I had to take a break every 20~30mins, but still loved this game.
